column4: hey, i'm having a little trouble, i was trying to set up embedded media streaming in firefox, and trying out some different libraries, mplayer and xine, and thought id have a look at soem other media players while i was at it, then when i was done, kaffiene wouldn't uninstall and now nothign works, it says libasound.so.2 is broken and libstdc++
and things like nautilus and gnome terminal wont start up cos they can't access the shared libraries
i can get xfce up and runnig tho
do you have a history of what changes you made?  command line history?  synaptic history?
